entry.dcterms:title: Popular Opinion About the Environmental Policy and Cleanness of Miskolc 2001
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E56: Popular Opinion About the Environmental Policy and Cleanness of Miskolc 2001. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-13
entry.dcterms:creator: Józan, Anna
entry.dcterms:description: opinions about the cleanness of the surrounding of Miskolc, the cement factory in Helyőcsaba, the alternative heating methods
entry.dcterms:subject: local society, region
trade, industry and markets
natural resources and environment
person
survey data
cross-section

A 1000-person random sample selected from the subscribers of the local MATÁV district. The sample is composed of 507 persons from Hejőcsaba and 511 persons from other Miskolc-related subsamples. The subsamples can be separated by using the variable ALMINTA.
Telephone interview based on questionnaire.
A
